title: Presidio of San Francisco: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do        Park visitors at the West Bluff picnic area    Â    The Presidio offers many opportunities for recreational activities, including picnic areas along Crissy Field at East Beach and West Bluff, and at El Polin Spring.   Enjoy nature, vistas and historic landscapes through a variety of outdoor activities. There are also many indoor recreational opportunities, particularly in the old airfield buildings along the west end of Crissy Field.   There are also some fun activities for kids and groups may arrange for special guided tours in advance.
